accessibility.info: it loads site improve addons and click the addons buttons

cmd.info: During development of selenium wrapper keep command line on top

connect.info: Launch a selected driver on top of the grid

debug.info: display info in realtime for debugging

driver.info: select driver from (chrome, edge, firefox, iexplorer)

drivers.info: select multiple drivers from (chrome, edge, firefox, iexplorer)

focus.info: focus browser window. This action works partially on iexplorer or edge, those browser needs not to be minimized in order to operate.

gui.info: Open a browser to access the grid url and show the different sessions if any

hostname.info: provide a hostname to complete a url with relative path

path_project.info: mainly use to get the hostname info for the relative url. If not set path project is the current directory.

page.info: this function needs that the current project have a file named hostname_url.txt with the hostname path. The you can use --page without argument to get to the home page. Otherwise use --page login to reach to hostname/login and so on

params.info: add url parameters by providing a json file (can be relative) or a json string (double or single quotes).

scroll.info: scroll browser page. Default go bottom

selenium_options.info: Show all command line options for Selenium Server
